Recently, I’ve been experiencing swelling in my legs and around my ankles, which I think might be related to my kidney issues.

My legs are swelling up more than they used to, and I have to pee a lot too. I think these things are getting worse, and I’m scared it’s something serious about my heart or my kidneys because I just don’t feel good at all.
